title: Oxfam in Uganda
subtitle: The gender and protection team in Bidibidi Refugee Settlement has testified that cases of Gender Based Violence in their communities have reduced. Thanks to our interventions, the future is GBV free pic.twitter.com/9qBGSfR8ow

title: Aggie sonko
subtitle:
Its a pity that refugees get to be known by many through statistics  forgetting the fact that these are humans.  Seeking asylum is a right & refugees fleeing war shouldn't have to choose horrific means to reach safety, refugees must not be dehumanised but welcomed.
#WithRefugees.pic.twitter.com/rs98AI9Lys
